```{r}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
```


```{r}
#| echo: false

liste_sorties_raw <- read_delim(
  "www/Liste_Sorties.csv",
  delim = ";",
  escape_double = FALSE,
  col_types = cols(
    `Date début` = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d"),
    `Date fin` = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")
  ),
  trim_ws = TRUE
)

liste_sorties_raw |>
  mutate(
    Année = year(`Date début`),
    Début = format(`Date début`, "%d %B %Y"),
    Fin = format(`Date fin`, "%d %B %Y"),
    Bilan = paste0("[Bilan](", Bilan, ")")
  ) |>
  arrange(desc(`Date début`)) |>
  select(Année, Site = Lieu, Période, Début, Fin, Bilan) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_markdown(columns = Bilan) |>
  opt_interactive(
    use_pagination = FALSE,
    use_search = TRUE,
    use_filters = TRUE,
    use_compact_mode = TRUE,
    use_text_wrapping = FALSE,
    use_highlight = TRUE
  )
```
